pullRequest.title: PLANNER-2048 Remove xStreamAnnotatedClass
pullRequest.bodyText:
Motivation: optaplanner-benchmark should not be coupled with any data serialization technology, if there is already a general way of reading input datasets, the SolutionFileIO.

  review and update documentation.
  add a note to the upgrade recipe

Upgrade recipe: kiegroup/optaplanner-website#255

nodes.bodyText: Are these actually necessary? Maybe there are in the XML, but in the code, I was always able to get away with just using XStreamSolutionFileIO.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
+/*

+ * distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+ * WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+ * See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+ * limitations under the License.
+ */
+
+package org.optaplanner.examples.cloudbalancing.persistence;
+
+import org.optaplanner.examples.cloudbalancing.domain.CloudBalance;
+import org.optaplanner.persistence.xstream.impl.domain.solution.XStreamSolutionFileIO;
+
+public class CloudBalanceSolutionFileIO extends XStreamSolutionFileIO<CloudBalance> {

nodes.bodyText:
Can we make it a top-level class? This dollar syntax just makes it more confusing to me.
(Although it's nice to see that it works.)
